about_the_game:
The final frontier would be dreary and dull with no sound at all. Space may be silent, but spaceships and alien worlds are not. This pack's twenty tracks supply the audio textures you'll need to give life to your alien hives and deep space voyages!

In space, no one can hear you scream... but in a spaceship, you can hear lots of things! Humming engines and electronic emissions, data dancing through the computer core, and much more are what you'll find in this pack of ambient atmospheres. Mechanical and organic are both represented, with forays into alien territory alongside the more man-made noises. Add auditory detail to your science-fictional worlds with this pack's twenty tracks!

This pack contains:

  • 8 ambient atmospheres, 7 drones, and 5 soundscapes suitable for sci-fi settings!
  • .ogg, .m4a and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice.

Tracklist:

1 - Ambient - Endless Expanse
2 - Ambient - Long Range Scanner
3 - Ambient - Memory Core
4 - Ambient - Oort Cloud
5 - Ambient - Planetfall
6 - Ambient - Star Chamber
7 - Ambient - Stellar Probe
8 - Ambient - Unearthly Landscape
9 - Drone - Energy Exchanger
10 - Drone - Moonbase Delta
11 - Drone - Power Conduit
12 - Drone - Research Lab
13 - Drone - Restricted Zone
14 - Drone - Sub Level
15 - Drone - Warp Reactor
16 - Soundscape - Alien Guts
17 - Soundscape - Data Matrix
18 - Soundscape - Hatchery Heart
19 - Soundscape - Hive Mind
20 - Soundscape - Lost in Transmission

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Futuristic Atmospheres 2

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Futuristic Atmospheres 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Space may be silent, but spaceships and alien worlds are not.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
